title: Roman Numeral Converter
description: Convert numbers to Roman numerals and back (I, V, X…).

helper.text: Supported range: 1–3999. Roman numerals are validated and normalized to the canonical form.

empty: Enter a value to see the result.

number.range: Please enter a number between 1 and 3999.

roman.characters: Only Roman numeral letters are allowed (I, V, X, L, C, D, M).

openGraph.title: Roman Numeral Converter
openGraph.description: Free Roman numeral converter for fast number-to-Roman and Roman-to-number conversion (1–3999), with validation and canonical form guidance for accurate results.
